title: TOF x Pulse Height Energies Low Energy High Time resolution Oxygen intensities and pressures sorted by pitch angles - Lou Lanzerotti (New Jersey Institute of Technology)

info.contact: Lou Lanzerotti @ New Jersey Institute of Technology

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Ephemeris Time of the start  of the accumulation for this measurement.

parameters.name: FODU
parameters.description: FODU:UniDirectional Differential Oxygen Flux,  49-161 keV, one record per spin binned by pitch angle in 17 bins  (as energy-angle displays)

bins.name: FODU_Energy
bins.description: Midpoint energy of each measurement channel in MeV. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

bins.name: PA_Midpoint
bins.description: Center-point pitch angle in Degrees.

parameters.name: FODU_byE_atA
parameters.description: ---> Spectrograms by energy at sample pitch angles. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FODU']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_DISPLAY_TYPE: default_dimensiony=FODU_Energy, z=FODU_byE_atA(*,1), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,3), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,5), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,7), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,9), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,11), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,14), z=FODU_byE_atA(*,17)

parameters.name: FODU_Error
parameters.description: The Poisson statistical counting percentage error of the measurement for each energy channel and bin calculated as 1/sqrt(Counts)*100.

parameters.name: FODU_PerpPressure
parameters.description: Calculated Oxygen perpendicular partial pressure for energies: 49-161keV.  Does not include noisy energy channels.

parameters.name: FODU_ParaPressure
parameters.description: Calculated Oxygen parallel partial pressure for energies: 49-161keVkeV.  Does not include noisy energy channels.

parameters.name: FODU_Density
parameters.description: The Number Density (#/cm^3) calculated by integrating the distribution function over energy (49-161keVkeV) and pitch angle for Oxygen. Does not include noisy energy channels.

parameters.name: FODU_IntegralFlux
parameters.description: Pitch Angle Integrated and Energy Integrated total intensity of Oxygen observed during the spin for energies: 49-161keV. Does not include noisy energy channels.

parameters.name: FODU_OmniFlux
parameters.description: Omni Directional Total Oxygen Flux per spin for energies: 49-161keV (Counts/(MeV-s-cm^2))

bins.name: FODU_Energy
bins.description: Midpoint energy of each measurement channel in MeV. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

parameters.name: FODU_MinimFlux
parameters.description: ---> Observed minimum intensity in the spin for each energy channel measured (49-161keV): Counts/(MeV-cm^2-s)

bins.name: FODU_Energy
bins.description: Midpoint energy of each measurement channel in MeV. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

parameters.name: FODU_MaximFlux
parameters.description: ---> Observed maximum intensity in the spin for each energy channel measured (49-161keV): Counts/(MeV-cm^2-s)

bins.name: FODU_Energy
bins.description: Midpoint energy of each measurement channel in MeV. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Position of the SC in the GEO Reference Frame.

parameters.name: Position_SM
parameters.description: ---> Position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates

parameters.name: Position_GSM
parameters.description: ---> Position of the SC in the GSM Reference Frame.

parameters.name: Position_Quality
parameters.description: ---> The position quality flag, 0=good, 1=bad.

parameters.name: OrbitNumber
parameters.description: Orbit Number at the time of the measurement

parameters.name: L
parameters.description: ---> Dipole L value calculated using the SM Reference Frame

parameters.name: L_Eq
parameters.description: ---> McElqain L value calculated at the Equator (derived from ECT MagEphem data).

parameters.name: L_Star
parameters.description: ---> Roeder's L* value (derived from ECT MagEphem data) for the average pitch angle.

parameters.name: I
parameters.description: ---> Integral invariant for the average pitch angle derived from ECT MagEphem data.

parameters.name: MLT
parameters.description: ---> Magnetic Local Time of S/C in Centerted Dipole Coordinates derived from ECT MagEphem data.

parameters.name: Position_TT
parameters.description: [Labels on plots] Position of the SC in the GEO Reference Frame.. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Position']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
